snippet: A pair of Magellanic penguins did a meet and greet at Blackstone's offices in Midtown Manhattan, courtesy of their employer, SeaWorld Parks and Entertainment, a portfolio company of the private equity giant.
abstract: A pair of Magellanic penguins did a meet and greet at Blackstone's offices in Midtown Manhattan, courtesy of their employer, SeaWorld Parks and Entertainment, a portfolio company of the private equity giant.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Blackstone's Latest Hired Help? No, Just Two Well-Dressed Visitors
